data.text: Wicked people run away even when no one is pursuing them,
When the people of a nation sin, they will have one ruler after another;
A poor person who oppresses other poor people
Those who reject/disobey God’s laws always speak well of wicked people;
Evil people do not understand what it means to act justly,
It is better to be honest even though you are poor
Young people who obey the laws are wise [IDM];
When people become very rich by charging very high interest [DOU],
If people do not obey [MTY] God’s laws,
Those who cause honest/good people to do what is evil
Many rich people think that they are wise,
When righteous/good people ◄succeed/win elections►, everyone ◄celebrates/is happy►;
Those who refuse to confess/admit their sins will not prosper,
God is pleased with those who always revere him,
Wicked people who mistreat poor people whom they rule
Rulers who do not have good sense cruelly oppress the people they rule,
Those who are guilty of murdering [MTY] another person
Those who continually do what is right will be safe/protected,
Farmers who work hard in their fields will produce good crops and always have plenty of food to eat,
God will greatly bless those who ◄are trustworthy/always do what they say that they will do►,
It is not good for judges to decide matters unfairly/unjustly,
Selfish people [IDM] are very eager to become rich quickly;
Those who rebuke someone will be appreciated/thanked more
Anyone who steals things from his father or his mother
Greedy people cause trouble/strife;
Those who believe that what they think is always right are foolish;
Those who give things to poor people will not become poor,
When wicked people become rulers, people hide because they are afraid of what those wicked people will do;
